[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601389028964{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Penetration-Testing-1.jpg?id=11113) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”padding_right_large:0px|padding_right_medium:30px”]

Penetration Testing

How secure are your systems and networks against targeted cyber attacks? We can help you find out.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right center” css=”.vc_custom_1595425785792{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 270px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Pen-testing.jpg?id=9497) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Penetration Testing

How secure are your systems and
networks against targeted
cyber attacks?
We can help you find out.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1588849858825{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/yellow-middle-section.jpg?id=8868) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1599744145433{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:-230px|padding_top_large:60px|padding_right_large:50px|padding_bottom_large:20px|padding_left_large:50px|margin_top_medium:-230px|padding_top_medium:60px|padding_right_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:20px|padding_left_medium:30px|margin_top_small:-230px|padding_top_small:60px|padding_right_small:30px|padding_bottom_small:20px|padding_left_small:30px”]

CREST-certified

penetration testing services

[vc_column_text el_class=”intro-text”]

Penetration tests are simulated attacks carried out by our testing team. They employ the same techniques that attackers use to reveal if your systems or applications can withstand hostile attacks and whether discovered vulnerabilities can lead to further intrusion and exploitation.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner gap=”25″ css=”.vc_custom_1595431128178{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}” el_class=”square-icons” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:50px|padding_right_large:60px|padding_left_large:60px|padding_top_small:50px|padding_right_small:0px|padding_left_small:0px”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

Uncover critical vulnerabilities in your organisation.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

Enable you to prioritise and address risks through detailed reports.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433029046{margin-right: -20px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

Assisting in meeting industry and regulatory compliance.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1591200589174{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″][vc_empty_space height=”60px”]

Our penetration testing services

[vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”35″ ca_init_rotate_x=”0″ ca_init_rotate_y=”0″ ca_init_translate_z=”0″ ca_init_rotate_z=”0″ ca_duration=”1200″ ca_delay=”150″][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-1″]

Vulnerability assessments

Vulnerability penetration testing assessments provide your systems with non-intrusive, automated and regular tests to identify security loopholes in your systems and networks, rather than specific attack scenarios. These vulnerabilities are then measured on a scale of severity.

Social engineering

Our social engineering services focus on highlighting the risks posed by the human element of your organisation. Since unaware staff can give away important information without realising, our testing can help you assess if your employees might be a security risk.

External infrastructure penetration testing

Infrastructure penetration testing evaluates how secure your external perimeter is from cyber-attacks. This test will also identify hosts which may require additional testing, such as web applications.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-1″ css=”.vc_custom_1600877260440{margin-top: 0px !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:50px|margin_top_medium:50px”]

Web application testing

Web application testing identifies flaws or security issues that may allow for your website or web applications to be hacked, putting sensitive data at risk. From internet technologies, mobile applications, APIs and everything in between, we can provide you with extensive testing on all of your application types.

Internal and wireless network testing

An internal network penetration test simulates an attacker who has gained access to the network by breaching the organisation’s technical or physical perimeter, or a malicious insider who has legitimate network access. The test will assess the difficulty with which an attacker can escalate their privileges, with a goal of proving access to sensitive and confidential data on the network.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_btn title=”Read our Terms & Conditions” style=”flat” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ffalanxcyber.com%2Fterms-and-conditions-for-manpower-services%2F|||”]

Get a free, no obligation quote

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601389057485{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-about” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

    Testimonials

    [/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

    “I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

    Claudia Zimmer
    Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

    “The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

    Mitchell Smith
    Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

    “We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

    James Myhill
    Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

    “Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

    Tony Donn
    Head of IT, Cenkos

    “Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

    Tony Donn
    Head of IT, Cenkos

    “We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

    Cyber Security Manager
    Leading Specialist Bank
    [/vc_column][/vc_row]
